item.description:
The Paddock is a well-known Cape Cod landmark restaurant and bar that for over forty years has served some of the best food on the peninsula. Located next to the Cape Cod Melody Tent, The Paddock is a popular nightspot in Hyannis offering live entertainment on weekends in the newly renovated bar and lounge.

The Paddock was established by John and Maxine Zartarian in 1970, soon thereafter making a name for themselves as restaurateurs of note and owners of one of the most famous dining establishments in the area.

The antique wood paneled interior and relaxed seating along with the quality food and outstanding service contribute to the unique and memorable dining experience one can look forward to at the Paddock.

 

NOTE:  Your welcome to come by 5:00 pm, however, I can't get there until 5:30 pm!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: 1/2 Price Appetizers in the Bar from 5:00pm - 6:30pm at the Paddock Restaurant
